name: Forest Battle 森林战斗
description:
What kind of game is it?

This is a self-move type of game where you have to choose your way forward, fight or encounter an event or enter a store. Use the earned gold to buy treasures or equipment or consumables, hire powerful players, and make your team stronger. Constantly defeat the enemy in front of the road, to the bottom of the barrier, challenge additional trials, gain high scores.

How to play games to Save money?

The standard price of the game is 15 yuan, with a 30% discount on the first game. If you want to save money, you can buy the game after you see the discount.

Forest battle development is not easy, the follow-up will open the game group, discuss with you, for more content updates.
